channel.title: Client Error?
channel.description:
When I load my webclient the certificate pops up asking if you want to trust the java program and I click accept then the java console starts to load and I get an error that says
[code] java.lang.NumberFormatException: null at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at client.init(client.java:294) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception: java.lang.NumberFormatException: null [/code]
Does anyone here know what I did wrong?

item.title: Client Error?
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

When I load my webclient the certificate pops up asking if you want to trust the java program and I click accept then the java console starts to load and I get an error that says

java.lang.NumberFormatException: null
	at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
	at client.init(client.java:294)
	at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Exception: java.lang.NumberFormatException: null

Does anyone here know what I did wrong?

Read full topic
